00023 public:
00024

00027

00029       return wxString(_("Repair"));
00030    }
00031 
00032    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00033       std::set<wxString> result;
00034       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#NoiseRemoval"));
00035       return result;
00036    }
00037 
00038    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00039       return wxString(wxT("Repair"));

00041

00043       return wxString(_("Repairing damaged audio"));
00044    }
